ygData.subject: Re: Something fun to try
ygData.msgSnippet: While what you did may have been warranted, isn t purposely dropping a train on someone a bannable offense?  That s what I have read on EQVault so I would say
ygData.messageBody:
While what you did may have been warranted, isn't purposely dropping a train
on someone a bannable offense? That's what I have read on EQVault so I
would say do this with caution if you decide someone deserves it.

Galtin
E'ci

<snip>
> Using Selo's and my drum, I lead the SG right on top of
> Naluvin et Voila... no more witty Dark Elf comments in OOC.
>
> This is also useful for clearing out EXCESSIVE campers of the derv camps
> in NRO and other areas, especially those who get rather vocal when you
> ask if you can have a kill or two.
>
>
